title: Is this e-mail about Google plus a real settlement?
subtitle: If you are Google Plus user between 2015 and early 2019, you can get compensation from this class action.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: According to an e-mail issued in August 2020, some former Google Plus users were eligible for cash payments from a judicial settlement in 2018 after a software issue revealed special data for up to half a million social network users.
